languages.text: "Темные кузены отыскали наши ковчеги в холодных объятиях пустоты. Поначалу нам казалось, что они спасут нас, протянут руку помощи... И потому мы поведали братьям о том, что случилось с Крударахом и где его можно найти. Но темные души кузенов темны и полны жажды крови. Мой ковчег... стал одним из первых, который они захватили".

traits.locale_text: "Темные кузены отыскали наши ковчеги в холодных объятиях пустоты. Поначалу нам казалось, что они спасут нас, протянут руку помощи... И потому мы поведали братьям о том, что случилось с Крударахом и где его можно найти. Но темные души кузенов темны и полны жажды крови. Мой ковчег... стал одним из первых, который они захватили".

languages.text: "Our twisted cousins found our arks in the void's cold embrace. At first it seemed they were going to save us, to extend a helping hand... and so we told them what had happened to Crudarach and where to look for it. But our cousins' souls are dark and thirst for blood. My ark... was one of the first they seized."
languages.original_text: "Темные кузены отыскали наши ковчеги в холодных объятиях пустоты. Поначалу нам казалось, что они спасут нас, протянут руку помощи... И потому мы поведали братьям о том, что случилось с Крударахом и где его можно найти. Но темные души кузенов темны и полны жажды крови. Мой ковчег... стал одним из первых, который они захватили".

traits.locale_text: "Our dark cousins found our arks in the void's cold embrace. At first it seemed they were going to save us, to extend a helping hand... And so we told them what had happened to Crudarach and where to look for it. But our cousins' souls are dark and thirst for blood. My ark... was one of the first they seized."

"Our dark cousins found our arks in the void's cold embrace. At first it seemed they were going to save us, to extend a helping hand... And so we told them what had happened to Crudarach and where to look for it. But our cousins' souls are dark and thirst for blood. My ark... was one of the first they seized."

But our cousins' souls are dark and thirst for blood. My ark... was one of the first they seized."

"Our twisted cousins found our arks in the void's cold embrace. At first it seemed they were going to save us, to extend a helping hand... and so we told them what had happened to Crudarach and where to look for it. But our cousins' souls are dark and thirst for blood. My ark... was one of the first they seized."

"Our twisted cousins found our arks in the void's cold embrace. At first it seemed they were going to save us, to extend a helping hand... and so we told them what had happened to Crudarach and where to look for it. But our cousins' souls are dark and thirst for blood. My ark... was one of the first they seized."

languages.text: «Nuestros degenerados primos hallaron nuestras arcas en el frío seno del vacío. Al principio pareció que iban a salvarnos, a extendernos una mano amiga... así que les contamos lo que le ocurrió a Crudarach y dónde buscar los restos. Pero las almas de nuestros primos son tenebrosas y sanguinarias. Mi arca... fue una de las primeras que capturaron».
languages.original_text: "Our twisted cousins found our arks in the void's cold embrace. At first it seemed they were going to save us, to extend a helping hand... and so we told them what had happened to Crudarach and where to look for it. But our cousins' souls are dark and thirst for blood. My ark... was one of the first they seized."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestros degenerados primos hallaron nuestras arcas en el frío seno del vacío. Al principio pareció que iban a salvarnos, a extendernos una mano amiga... así que les contamos lo que le ocurrió a Crudarach y dónde buscar los restos. Pero las almas de nuestros primos son tenebrosas y sanguinarias. Mi arca... fue una de las primeras que capturaron».

languages.text: 「性悪な我々のいとこたちが、虚空の冷たい抱擁の中で我々の箱舟を見つけた。初めは彼らが我々を助け、救いの手を差し伸べようとしているように思えた.…だから我々は彼らに、クルダラに起こったことや、その場所を教えた。だが、いとこたちの魂は暗く、血に飢えていた。私の箱舟は…いち早く彼らに奪われた」
languages.original_text: "Our twisted cousins found our arks in the void's cold embrace. At first it seemed they were going to save us, to extend a helping hand... and so we told them what had happened to Crudarach and where to look for it. But our cousins' souls are dark and thirst for blood. My ark... was one of the first they seized."

traits.locale_text: 「性悪な我々のいとこたちが、虚空の冷たい抱擁の中で我々の箱舟を見つけた。初めは彼らが我々を助け、救いの手を差し伸べようとしているように思えた.…だから我々は彼らに、クルダラに起こったことや、その場所を教えた。だが、いとこたちの魂は暗く、血に飢えていた。私の箱舟は…いち早く彼らに奪われた」

languages.text: “在虚空冰冷的怀抱之中，我们那些邪恶的表亲找到了我们的方舟。最开始，他们看起来像是要搭救我们，向我们伸出了援助之手……于是我们告诉了他们克鲁达拉赫的遭遇，以及它的残骸去了什么地方。然而，我们那些表情黑暗的灵魂不知满足，渴望鲜血。于是我的方舟……便成了他们的第一批俘虏。”
languages.original_text: "Our twisted cousins found our arks in the void's cold embrace. At first it seemed they were going to save us, to extend a helping hand... and so we told them what had happened to Crudarach and where to look for it. But our cousins' souls are dark and thirst for blood. My ark... was one of the first they seized."

traits.locale_text: “在虚空冰冷的怀抱之中，我们那些邪恶的表亲找到了我们的方舟。最开始，他们看起来像是要搭救我们，向我们伸出了援助之手……于是我们告诉了他们克鲁达拉赫的遭遇，以及它的残骸去了什么地方。然而，我们那些表情黑暗的灵魂不知满足，渴望鲜血。于是我的方舟……便成了他们的第一批俘虏。”

languages.text: « Nos cousins retors ont trouvé nos arches dans la froide étreinte du vide. D'abord, nous pensions qu'ils allaient nous sauver, nous tendre une main secourable... Alors, nous leur avons dit ce qu'il était advenu de Crudarach et où le trouver. Mais les âmes de nos cousins sont noires et assoiffées de sang. Mon arche... a été la première saisie. »
languages.original_text: "Our twisted cousins found our arks in the void's cold embrace. At first it seemed they were going to save us, to extend a helping hand... and so we told them what had happened to Crudarach and where to look for it. But our cousins' souls are dark and thirst for blood. My ark... was one of the first they seized."

traits.locale_text: « Nos cousins retors ont trouvé nos arches dans la froide étreinte du vide. D'abord, nous pensions qu'ils allaient nous sauver, nous tendre une main secourable... Alors, nous leur avons dit ce qu'il était advenu de Crudarach et où le trouver. Mais les âmes de nos cousins sont noires et assoiffées de sang. Mon arche... a été la première saisie. »

languages.text: "Unsere Archenschiffe wurden von unseren verdorbenen Verwandten in der kalten Umarmung der Leere gefunden. Zunächst wirkte es so, als wöllten sie uns retten, uns eine helfende Hand reichen ... also erzählten wir ihnen, was mit Crudarach geschehen war und wo sie es finden würden. Aber die Seelen unserer Verwandten sind dunkel und dürsten nach Blut. Mein Archenschiff ... war eines der ersten, das sie an sich rissen."
languages.original_text: "Our twisted cousins found our arks in the void's cold embrace. At first it seemed they were going to save us, to extend a helping hand... and so we told them what had happened to Crudarach and where to look for it. But our cousins' souls are dark and thirst for blood. My ark... was one of the first they seized."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Archenschiffe wurden von unseren verdorbenen Verwandten in der kalten Umarmung der Leere gefunden. Zunächst wirkte es so, als wöllten sie uns retten, uns eine helfende Hand reichen ... also erzählten wir ihnen, was mit Crudarach geschehen war und wo sie es finden würden. Aber die Seelen unserer Verwandten sind dunkel und dürsten nach Blut. Mein Archenschiff ... war eines der ersten, das sie an sich rissen."

languages.text: "Sapkın kuzenlerimiz, uçsuzun soğuk koynundaki arklarımızı buldular. İlk başta bizi kurtaracak, bize bir yardım eli uzatacak gibi duruyorlardı... Biz de onlara Crudarach'a neler olduğunu ve onu nerede bulabileceklerini anlattık. Ancak kuzenlerimizin ruhlarını karanlık, gözlerini kan bürümüştür. Arkım... El koydukları ilk şey oldu."
languages.original_text: "Our twisted cousins found our arks in the void's cold embrace. At first it seemed they were going to save us, to extend a helping hand... and so we told them what had happened to Crudarach and where to look for it. But our cousins' souls are dark and thirst for blood. My ark... was one of the first they seized."

traits.locale_text: "Sapkın kuzenlerimiz, uçsuzun soğuk koynundaki arklarımızı buldular. İlk başta bizi kurtaracak, bize bir yardım eli uzatacak gibi duruyorlardı... Biz de onlara Crudarach'a neler olduğunu ve onu nerede bulabileceklerini anlattık. Ancak kuzenlerimizin ruhlarını karanlık, gözlerini kan bürümüştür. Arkım... El koydukları ilk şey oldu."
